prompt_base: realistic photo of a corrupted deity, lean muscular build, fierce evil smirk, green Potara earring, long jet black hair, intimidating presence, 8k cinematic photo, dark lighting
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin texture, malevolent glare in his dark eyes, realistic flowing fabric texture on robes, gold embroidery, visible dark energy veins, wind-swept hair, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, flat lighting, friendly face, bright color, soft, low quality, blurry face, (human-like:1.2), normal hair, short hair
